doc.name: InputModelAttributes
doc.description: Container for decorator attributes that are provided to Ptides platform inputs by analysis tools that need guarantess about the input patterns on eacn input port. The PtidesToMultiFrame attribute decorates input ports in a Ptides model with the attributes contained by an instance this class.
doc.author: Christos Stergiou
doc.property: The minimum distance of two successive events at an input port.
